function.name: TestPropagation
function.syntax: int TestPropagation(float hop, float vheight, float slant_dist, float D_hmin, float D_hmax, float E_hmax);

description.p: The TestPropagation function takes the hop, virtual height, slant distance, and regional limits and tests the propagation path for realism.

function.returns: Returns 1 for a good path and 0 for a bad path.

function.name: AdjustPropagation
function.syntax: void AdjustPropagation(int lobe, float radius, float D_hmin, float D_hmax, float E_hmax, float F_hmax, float max_hop, int bmnum, int tfreq, struct RadarSite *site, double psi_obs, float *hop, float *vheight, double *elv, float *slant_dist);

description.p: The AdjustPropagation function tests the propagation path for backscatter with the specified characteristics against the provided ionospheric regional limits for realism and adjusts the hop if needed.

function.name: SetRegion
function.syntax: void SetRegion(float hop, float D_hmin, float D_hmax, float E_hmax, float F_hmax, float vheight, char *region);

description.p: The SetRegion function determines the ionospheric region using a set of provided virtual height limits, the hop, and the virtual height for a backscatter observation.
